title: STAR-Based Mathematics Job Competency Education for Enhancing Employment Skill Articulation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and relevant work experience
context.additional_context: Training focused on expressing mathematical job competencies in STAR format within smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, utilizing practical cases considering managerial/leadership roles

learning_goals: Learners can concretely describe mathematics-related job experiences in STAR format (Situation/Task-Action-Result)
Learners can maintain the ability to effectively express employability skills using STAR format up to six months later
Learners can create and submit competency assessment reports based on mathematical problem-solving experiences

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
